original: <color=#faffa3ff>《初夏睡起》楊萬里梅子流酸濺齒牙，芭蕉分綠上窗紗。日長睡起無情思，閒看兒童捉柳花。</color><color=#ff0000ff>想要執行季內政嗎？</color>
text: <color=#faffa3ff> "Sleep in Early Summer" Yang Wanli plums are splashed with acid, plantains are divided into green screens. Richang sleeps ruthlessly, watching children catch willow flowers leisurely. </color><color=#ff0000ff>Do you want to carry out the internal affairs of the quarter? </color>
